pullRequest.title: Support building gRPC TLS channel but CA file is not required
pullRequest.bodyText:
If this is non-trivial feature, paste the links/URLs to the design doc.


 Update the documentation to include this new feature.


 Tests(including UT, IT, E2E) are added to verify the new feature.


 If it's UI related, attach the screenshots below.


 If this pull request closes/resolves/fixes an existing issue, replace the issue number. Closes #6040.


 Update the CHANGES log.

commit.message: Support building TLS grpc channel and CA file is optional

Support building TLS grpc channel and CA file is optional

Support building TLS grpc channel and CA file is optional
Merge branch 'feature/tls_without_trust_manager' of https://github.com/buxingzhe/skywalking into feature/tls_without_trust_manager
Merge branch 'feature/tls_without_trust_manager' of https://github.com/buxingzhe/skywalking into feature/tls_without_trust_manager
Merge branch 'feature/tls_without_trust_manager' of https://github.com/buxingzhe/skywalking into feature/tls_without_trust_manager

nodes.bodyText: Change this name to FORCE_TLS. There is only gRPC transport.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -124,6 +124,11 @@
          * Keep tracing even the backend is not available.
          */
         public static boolean KEEP_TRACING = false;
+
+        /**
+         * Should TLS enabled for gRPC channels
+         */
+        public static boolean IS_GRPC_CHANNEL_TLS_FORCED = true;

nodes.bodyText: Also, there is a config table in the agent setup doc, please update it too.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -19,6 +19,10 @@ Only support **no mutual auth**.
 ### Agent config
 - Place `ca.crt` into `/ca` folder in agent package. Notice, `/ca` is not created in distribution, please create it by yourself.
 
-Agent open TLS automatically after the `/ca/ca.crt` file detected.
+Agent will open TLS upon the following config value. If it's true, TLS will be forced to use, and TLS works by default.
+At the same time, a trust manager will be constructed for TLS authentication once the `/ca/ca.crt` file detected.
+```
+agent.is_grpc_channel_tls_forced=${SW_AGENT_IS_GRPC_CHANNEL_TLS_FORCED:true}
+```

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Agent will open TLS upon the following config value. If it's true, TLS will be forced to use, and TLS works by default.
          
          
            
            At the same time, a trust manager will be constructed for TLS authentication once the `/ca/ca.crt` file detected.
          
          
            
            - Agent open TLS automatically after the `/ca/ca.crt` file detected.
          
          
            
            - TLS with no CA mode could be activated by this setting.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -19,6 +19,10 @@ Only support **no mutual auth**.
 ### Agent config
 - Place `ca.crt` into `/ca` folder in agent package. Notice, `/ca` is not created in distribution, please create it by yourself.
 
-Agent open TLS automatically after the `/ca/ca.crt` file detected.
+Agent will open TLS upon the following config value. If it's true, TLS will be forced to use, and TLS works by default.
+At the same time, a trust manager will be constructed for TLS authentication once the `/ca/ca.crt` file detected.

commit.message: Merge branch 'feature/tls_without_trust_manager' of https://github.com/buxingzhe/skywalking into feature/tls_without_trust_manager

Merge branch 'feature/tls_without_trust_manager' of https://github.com/buxingzhe/skywalking into feature/tls_without_trust_manager

nodes.bodyText: I think if CA file exists, there is no need to change the FORCE_TLS=true manually.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            # If true, SkyWalking agent will force to build a TLS gRPC channel, and construct trust manager when file `/ca/ca.crt` exists,
          
          
            
            # otherwise a plain text gRPC channel to be built.
          
          
            
            # The agent use gRPC plain text in default.
          
          
            
            # If true, SkyWalking agent uses TLS even no CA file detect.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            o make sure can't access other ports out of region (VPC), such as firewall, proxy.
          
      
    
    
  

This seems meaningless?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -19,6 +19,10 @@ Only support **no mutual auth**.
 ### Agent config
 - Place `ca.crt` into `/ca` folder in agent package. Notice, `/ca` is not created in distribution, please create it by yourself.
 
-Agent open TLS automatically after the `/ca/ca.crt` file detected.
+- Agent open TLS automatically after the `/ca/ca.crt` file detected.
+- TLS with no CA mode could be activated by this setting.
+```
+agent.force_tls=${SW_AGENT_FORCE_TLS:false}
+```
 
-o make sure can't access other ports out of region (VPC), such as firewall, proxy.
\ No newline at end of file
+o make sure can't access other ports out of region (VPC), such as firewall, proxy.
